discs.title: Corvette
discs.description: The Corvette is the fastest class of distance drivers, Speed 14. With a high glide rating, the Corvette will get the distance you require.

discs.title: Destroyer
discs.description: This overstable distance driver is a great disc for beginners. If you love to throw sidearms, this disc is for you!

discs.title: Leopard3
discs.description: The Leopard3 is an understable fairway driver. This disc will fly however you want, so make sure to control your release angles.

discs.title: Aviar3
discs.description: The Aviar3 has comfortable grip for a putter. If you are looking for a straight controlled shot with a slight fade, throw the Aviar3.
